by the ongoing scandal. He still denies wrongdoing but felt the publicity made it impossible for him to get on with his job, said one friend. In a statement the Prime Minister said: I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my Director of Communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so. " Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the Government. For Philadelphia To Use On Michael Vick Franchise Tag Likely To Be Available For Philadelphia To Use On Michael Vick Philadelphia Inquirer- The Eagles should be free to use their franchise tag on Michael Vick , despite labor uncertainty. I expect the franchise tag to continue to operate as it has in prior seasons and clubs to be permitted to exercise their rights under the tag, Jeff Pash , the NFL's general counsel, said Thursday. The Eagles and Michael Vick have had casual discussions about such a deal, a source close to the situation said.
